text:
David Gold (born 9 September 1936) is an English businessman. Since 2010, he has been the joint chairman of Premier League club West Ham United with David Sullivan. He also served as chairman of Birmingham City Football Club until 2009. Gold owns Gold Group International (GGI), the parent company of the retailer Ann Summers and lingerie chain Knickerbox.
Gold was born in Stepney, East London. He is Jewish. He has two daughters, Jacqueline and Vanessa.
